formElement.label: Wsadmin Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of wsadmin, including filename and extension. If the path in which wsadmin is stored in the path environmental variable, the absolute path is ommited. i.e: '/path/to/wsadmin.sh' or 'wsadmin.bat'.

formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are gathered from the given configuration.

formElement.label: JDBC Provider:
formElement.documentation: Name of an existing JDBC Provider.

formElement.label: Datasource Name:
formElement.documentation: A unique name that identifies this Datasource in the WebSphere domain.

formElement.label: JNDI Name:
formElement.documentation: The JNDI path to where this Datasource is bound.

formElement.label: Statement Cache Size:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the number of statements that can be cached per connection. The application server caches a statement after you close that statement.

formElement.label: Datasource Helper Class Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the datasource helper class name.

formElement.label: Connection Type:
formElement.documentation: Specifies to type of connection to use to connect to the application server that you want to administer. The valid choices are SOAP, RMI, and NONE.
